explains: n. 纪念品，引起回忆的东西
wordGroup: memento mori 死的警告；死的象征

sentences.en: More anglers are taking cameras when they go fishing to provide a memento of catches.
sentences.cn: 更多的垂钓者去钓鱼时带上照相机，以便钓上鱼后留个纪念。

sentences.en: In the front was written: 'Darling Rosie; a memento of a wonderful weekend.
sentences.cn: 在扉页上赫然写道：亲爱的罗西，永久纪念这愉快的周末。

sentences.en: In the front was written: 'Darling Rosie; a memento of a wonderful weekend.'
sentences.cn: 在扉页上赫然写道：亲爱的罗西，永久纪念这愉快的周末。
